message.content:
cs.IT, cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.SY. 

This paper deals with the algebraic properties and representation of encoders in systematic form of Maximum Rank Distance (MRD) codes and Maximum Sum Rank Distance (MSRD) codes. The paper focuses on both block codes and convolutional codes separately and presents necessary and sufficient conditions for an encoder in systematic form to generate a code with maximum (sum) rank distance. These topics are related to information theory (cs.IT), graph theory (cs.GT), data structures (cs.DS), systems and control (cs.SY), and signal processing (cs.SI).
